prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (ancient imposing wizard creature:1.3), gaunt face, massive curved demonic horns, (long flowing white beard:1.2), wrinkled pale blue skin, menacing red eyes, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: extreme detail on skin texture and deep wrinkles, (weathered ancient goat-like skin:1.3), realistic coarse beard hair, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching tattered robes texture:1.2), sharp focus on horn keratin, cinematic dramatic lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human skin, smooth skin, baby face, low quality, youthful, clean
